name: Kevin Spacey and the Cosmonauts F1 in Schools
body:
### Kevin Spacey and the Cosmonauts
This is the official website for the Kevin Spacey and the Cosmonauts F1 in schools team.


### Mission Statement
This is Kevin Spacey and the Cosmonautsâ€™ first year competing in F1 racing. As such, their plan is to experience the event and attempt to compete at the highest level possible. KSC plans to uphold the level of integrity of Perry Robotics.

### Meet the Team
Noah Podrasky:
Team Manager,

David Boehmer:
Manufacturing Engineer,

Emma Ryder:
Resource Manager,

Tanner Kilian:
Graphic Designer,

Elijah Smith:
Design Engineer,

Brian Burca:
Design Engineer,
